extensionDescription.message: Unofficial voice control for Swagbucks.com | Works only on secure (https://) pages

loading.description: Shown as a part of the preloader screen on a page where data is being loaded asynchronously.

voiceControlSettings.description: Caption for a group of settings related to voice control in Options.

voiceControlSettingsLanguage.description: Caption for a list of languages in which the voice control commands may be given.

voiceControlSettingsHotword.description: Caption for a list of “hotwords” (keywords, key phrases) to choose from or whether the hotword functionality should be disabled.

voiceControlSettingsCommands.description: Let users know that there is a list of supported commands they can get familiar with by navigating the link.

saveSettings.description: Text of a button acting as a submit call-to-action for the settings form in Options.

saveSettingsTooltip.message:
No need to press this button,
all the changes get saved automatically.

Peace! :-)
saveSettingsTooltip.description: Some users have asked to have the “Save settings” button, but it's not really needed for the settings to be saved.

saveSettingsSuccess.description: Notifies user that the form changes have been saved.

saveSettingsPlaceboSuccess.description: The changes get saved automatically right away without the need to click “Save settings” button. But, if user clicks the button anyway, let this user know that it's all good. :-)

language_enUs.description: Language code to language (for English names, https://cloud.google.com/speech-to-text/docs/languages)

hotword_none.description: Answers “commandsHotword”'s message (when to expect a command). Means hotword functionality is disabled (no hotword is expected).

hotword_heySwaggy.description: Answers “commandsHotword”'s message (when to expect a command). Means will only listen for a specific command after user says “Hey, Swaggy”.

hotword_heySwagbucks.description: Answers “commandsHotword”'s message (when to expect a command). Means will only listen for a specific command after user says “Hey, Swagbucks”.

swagbucksCopyright.message: Swagbucks® trademark is the property of Prodege, LLC; all rights reserved. Not sponsored, endorsed, or administered by, or associated with Prodege, LLC.
swagbucksCopyright.description: Shortened version of the copyright from swagbucks.com that doesn't include any trademarks not mentioned here.

errorInvalidSettingsReturned.message: Extension settings seem corrupted. Try opening Options and changing any setting to cause the extension settings to be rebuilt. If that doesn't help, you might have to remove and install the extension again.
errorInvalidSettingsReturned.description: Might happen when trying to get stored extension settings in incorrect format (empty settings object).

browserActionBadgeText_on.description: Browser action badge text when the voice control listener is active. Ideally, should be 2-3 characters long. Otherwise, it will be shortened anyway and “...” will be displayed next to it.

browserActionBadgeText_off.description: Browser action badge text when the voice control listener is active. Ideally, should be 2-3 characters long. Otherwise, it will be shortened anyway and “...” will be displayed next to it.

browserActionBadgeTitle_on.message:
{{extensionName}}:
Listening for commands: YES.

Click to switch voice control off.
browserActionBadgeTitle_on.description: Browser action badge title displayed in a tooltip over the browser action's icon when the voice control listener is active.

browserActionBadgeTitle_off.message:
{{extensionName}}:
Listening for commands: NO.

Click to switch voice control on.
browserActionBadgeTitle_off.description: Browser action badge title displayed in a tooltip over the browser action's icon when the voice control listener is inactive.
